titleStmt.title: The court of the most illustrious and most magnificent Iames, the first King of Great-Britaine, France, and Ireland: &c. VVith diuers rules, most pure precepts, and selected definitions liuely delineated.
titleStmt.author: A. D. B., fl. 1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Griffin, in Eliots-Court in the Little-old-Baily, neere the Kings-head,

notesStmt.note: In fact a general guide to courtly behavior.
Running title reads: The court of King Iames.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Eliots-Court in the Little-old-Baily, neere the Kings-head
